thread.title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to March 22

author: Reuters Editorial
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to March 22

organizations.name: general news events index of all diaries guide to economic indicators
credit suisse latin america investment conference

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top Economic Events
Government Debt Auctions
Political and General News Events
Index of All Diaries
Guide to Economic Indicators This Diary is filed daily. ** Indicates new events TUESDAY, JANUARY 30
** CHISINAU - National Bank of Moldova announces interest rate decision.
SAO PAULO - Speakers at the Credit Suisse Latin America Investment Conference include Brazil central bank chief Ilan Goldfajn, Finance Minister Henrique Meirelles and the chief executives of Vale, Petrobras, Eletrobras and Magazine Luiza.
WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council Meeting (No Interest rate announcement).
BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank holds its rate-setting meeting - 1300 GMT SUNDAY, JANUARY 31 SANTIAGO - Central Bank of Chile holds monetary policy meeting - 2100 GMT (to Feb. 1).
THURSDAY, FEBRUARY 1 PRAGUE - Czech National Bank holds monetary policy meeting. Statement and presentation will be published. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland releases the minutes of its monitory policy meeting.
SUNDAY, FEBRUARY 5 SINGAPORE - ASEAN Finance and Central Bank Working Group Meetings (to Feb. 9). TUESDAY, FEBRUARY 6 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) holds interest rate meeting - 0330 GMT. BRASILIA- Central Bank of Brazil holds monetary policy committee meeting (to Feb. 7). WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds monetary policy council meeting (to Feb. 7). WEDNESDAY, FEBRUARY 7
TIRANA - Monetary Policy Statement of the Bank of Albania 2017 H2. NEW DELHI - Reserve Bank of India holds monetary policy committee meeting.
THURSDAY, FEBRUARY 8 LIMA – Central bank of Peru announces interest rate decision. MANILA - Philippines Central Bank holds monetary policy meeting. BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia interest rate decision. MEXICO - Central Bank of Mexico publishes Monetary policy statement. SYDNEY - Speech by RBA Governor Philip Lowe at A50 Australian Economic Forum dinner, Sydney.
FRIDAY, FEBRUARY 9 PRAGUE - Czech National Bank will release the minutes of its February 2018 monetary policy meeting. SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia issues statement on monetary policy – 0030 GMT. MOSCOW - Central Bank of Russia announces interest rate decision - 1030 GMT. MONDAY, FEBRUARY 12 SYDNEY - Speech by Luci Ellis, RBA Assistant Governor (Economic) at ABE Forecasting conference, Sydney – 2030 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, FEBRUARY 14 JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank holds board of governors meeting. (to Feb. 15). WINDHOEK - Central Bank of Namibia holds monetary policy meeting. ZAGREB - Croatia National Bank holds monetary policy meeting. BANGKOK - Bank of Thailand monetary policy committee meeting. KAMPALA - Bank of Uganda announces interest rate decision. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank to publish the minutes of its January 2018 rate-setting meeting – 1300 GMT. THURSDAY, FEBRUARY 15
CAIRO - Central Bank of Egypt holds monetary policy committee meeting.
MONDAY, FEBRUARY 19 SYDNEY - Speech by Michele Bullock, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial System) at Responsible Lending and Borrowing Summit, Sydney – 2215 GMT.
TUESDAY, FEBRUARY 20 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) will release the minutes of February Monetary Policy Meeting – 0030 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds monetary policy council meeting (no interest rate announcement).
THURSDAY, FEBRUARY 22 ATLANTA - Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic speaks before the 2108 Banking Outlook Conference hosted by the Atlanta Fed - 1710 GMT.
WARSAW - National Bank of Poland releases the minutes of its monitory policy meeting. MEXICO - Mexico Central Bank issues the minutes of its monetary policy meeting. FRIDAY, FEBRUARY 23 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia Payments System Board Meeting. TUESDAY, FEBRUARY 27
YEREVAN, Armenia - Armenia central bank to publish its inflation report SEOUL - Bank of Korea holds monetary policy meeting to announce interest rates.
BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank holds rate-setting meeting - 1300 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, FEBRUARY 28 SINGAPORE - 24th ASEAN Economic Ministers’ Retreat (AEM-R) and 16th AEMEU Trade Commissioner Consultations (to March 2).
THURSDAY, MARCH 1 ** CHISINAU - National Bank of Moldova announces interest rate decision.
KIEV - National Bank of Ukraine holds monetary policy meeting.
TUESDAY, MARCH 6 WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds monetary policy council meeting (to March 7). SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia holds interest rate meeting – 0330 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 7 TBILISI - National Bank of Georgia holds monetary policy committee meeting. KUALA LUMPUR - Central Bank of Malaysia announces interest rate decision.
THURSDAY, MARCH 8 LIMA – Central bank of Peru announces interest rate decision. BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia interest rate decision.
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 14 BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank to publish the minutes of its February 2018 rate-setting meeting – 1300 GMT.
THURSDAY, MARCH 15 SWITZERLAND - Swiss National Bank (SNB) to assess monetary policy – 0830GMT.
MONDAY, MARCH 19 SANTIAGO - Central Bank of Chile holds monetary policy meeting (to March 20). ABUJA - Central Bank of Nigeria holds monetary policy meeting (to Mar 20).
TUESDAY, MARCH 20 BRASILIA- Central Bank of Brazil holds monetary policy committee meeting (to March 21). SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) will release the minutes of March monetary policy meeting – 0030 GMT. RABAT - Bank of Morocco holds monetary policy meeting.
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 21 JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank holds board of governors meeting. (to March 22).
THURSDAY, MARCH 22 MANILA - Philippines Central Bank monetary policy meeting.
